description: Get your office under control with the HP J3680 Officejet All-in-One Printer, scanner, copier, and fax machine. This multifunction color printer produces laser-quality text and colorful documents fast and efficiently.Print and copy documents at speeds up to 20 pages per minute (ppm) in black and 14 ppm in color. Print quality exceeds that of other all-in-ones at 1200 x 1200 dpi for B&W prints and up to 4800 x 1200 dpi for color prints. The sheet-fed scanner uses 48-bit color depth and produces up to 19,200 dpi resolution in full-color. Unlike other fax machines, the J3680 will fax full-color documents for beautiful, professional-looking transmissions and do it as fast as 3 seconds per page. Paper handling is no problem with the 100-sheet input tray and 20-page automatic document feeder (ADF).Compatible with Windows and Macintosh, the J3680 measures 16.8 x 8.0 x 7.0 inches and weighs 12.0 pounds. It's backed by 1-year limited hardware warranty with 1-year of technical phone support.What's in the BoxHP Officejet J3680 All-in-One, HP 21 Black Inkjet Print Cartridge (~200 pages), HP 22 Tri-color Inkjet Print Cartridge (~165 pages), HP Photosmart Essential Software, setup guide, reference guide, power supply, power cord, phone cord.
title: HP J3680 Officejet All-in-One Printer
